name: Multiplayer FPS project
description:
Multiplayer FPS game. If your in Australia your in luck because that is where the region is set. Aussies get that low ping.  This is in extremely early stages but is has two fully functional guns and a large-ish map. just start by making a room and then when your friends want to join they just press join room and it will bring up a list of all currently active rooms.

Enjoy.
